document_data.name: ''Icebite Robe''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Icebite robes''''' were [[enchanted]] [[wizard]]ly [[robe]]s created sometime before the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: These blue robes were declared with delicate glittering ferns of frost.
document_data.Powers: The wearer of the robes was granted resistance to mundane and magical cold. Once per day, they could cast the ''[[armour of Agathys]]'' at a higher casting proficiency.
document_data.History: A single ''icebite robe'' was interred with its original owner within one of the sarcophagi near [[Reithwin]], long before the area round it was consumed by the ''[[Shadow-cursed lands|shadowcurse]]'' in the late 14{{th}} century DR.
